lead_paragraph: Gov. David A. Paterson will attend the beginning of a memorial service for Percy Sutton on Wednesday, then fly back to Albany to deliver his annual message.
snippet: Gov. David A. Paterson will attend the beginning of a memorial service for Percy Sutton on Wednesday, then fly back to Albany to deliver his annual message.

headline.main: Funeral Service for Sutton Means Travel for Governor
headline.seo: Service for Percy Sutton Means Scheduling Conflict for Governor
headline.print_headline: Service for Sutton Means Travel for Governor
